ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have both male and Female characters, mostly female but the only reason for me was for a bit of variety because all my characters are high elves, and because
ygData.messageBody:
I have both male and Female characters, mostly female but the only reason for me was for a bit of variety because all my characters are high elves, and because I usually play with all 4 main chars at once, (works out real good when u can control a cleric, druid, mage and a warrior yourself i.e. no idiots getting you killed because they don�t know what to do when everything goes to buggery, even on my 56K freeserve connection (which surprised the hell outta me thats for sure) but I digress, the only reason I use both male and female models is as I said because I play high elves and since most races are limited to a handful of different models male/female it can get hard to make them look completely different from each other especially if they are all wearing the same kind of gear like DRT's and leather, robes etc. Although I find playing a character that is the same sex as me is easier since I don�t have to keep reminding myself what sex my char is.

 Nuada (KIA)

24th Season Elven Mage

Druzil Ro

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

>luv,

>
> > Hi,
> >
> > ROFLOL at Rob. Yeah EC definitely!!!!
> >
> > I'm female and I play female characters. The only way I'd consider
>playing
> > a male character is if their stats were better. But, since EQ is an equal
> > opportunity creator, meaning men and women share the same stats, it's not
>an
> > issue.
> >
> > Now, I do notice that when I'm playing with my 22 year old son and his
>male
> > character I get a few more buffs than him but not often.
> >
> > Maybe men play female characters because they think it will help them
> > understand women better. LOL just joking!
> >
> > Anyway, I love the game and I don't care whether your male or female just
>as
> > long as you enjoy the game!
